titleStmt.title: A prayer sayd by the lorde Sturton being on his knees before he went up the ladder, and also his confession before his death the vi. day of Marche in the yeare of our lord God M.D.L.vii.
titleStmt.author: Stourton, Charles Stourton, Baron, d. 1557.

publicationStmt.publisher: Jmprinted at London in Fletestrete nere to Saint Dunstans Churche by Thomas Marshe,

notesStmt.note: Author's name provided from STC (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
